   "source": [
    "    PatternCount(Text, Pattern)\n",
    "        count ← 0\n",
    "        for i ← 0 to |Text| − |Pattern|\n",
    "            if Text(i, |Pattern|) = Pattern\n",
    "                count ← count + 1\n",
    "        return count"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 26,
   "metadata": {
    "collapsed": false
   },
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "def pc (txt, ptn):\n",
    "    ct = 0\n",
    "    i=0\n",
    "    tl = len(txt)\n",
    "    pl = len(ptn)\n",
    "    k =  int (tl- pl)\n",
    "    for x in range(0, k+1):\n",
    "        if txt [x:x+pl]  == ptn:\n",
    "            ct = ct+1\n",
    "    return ct\n",
    "            \n",
    "            "
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 27,
   "metadata": {
    "collapsed": false
   },
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {

     "execution_count": 27,

     "output_type": "execute_result"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "txt = ''\n",
    "ptn = 'CTCCGCACT'\n",
    "pc(txt, ptn)"
   ]
